name: Stickman and the sword of legends
name_original: Stickman and the sword of legends
description: Stickman needs to get the Sword of Legends to be able to leave his planet that is about to explode.You need to collect 3 boxes to pass each level , you can walk with WASD jump with space attack with the mouse and dash with Q , you can also change the camera angle with TAB.You can play 4 different levels , but they are not in their final form, some of them just close the game others are connected .
